# StringUtility.CreateComparer method

Creates a StringComparer ignoring or honoring the strings' case, and using culture-specific information to influence the comparison.

```csharp
public static StringComparer CreateComparer(CultureInfo cultureInfo, bool ignoreCase)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| cultureInfo | Culture info. |
| ignoreCase | If set to `true` ignore case. |

## Return Value

The comparer.
